%mdk-data-line={82}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[bed48832d5f376daaf500870845f8aa9]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={84}
\begin{aligned}
&|\E_{s \in_R \zo^{n}}[Eve'(G(s))]  - \E[Eve'(U_{\ell(n)}) ]| \\
&= |\E_{s \in_R \zo^{n}}[Eve'(G(s))| A] \Pr[A] + \E_{s \in R \zo^{n}}[Eve'(G(s)) |A^c] \Pr[A^c] - \E[Eve'[U_{\ell(b)}]| \\
&= |\frac{1}{2}\E_{s \in_R \zo^{n}}[Eve(G''(s))] + \frac{1}{2}\E_{s \in_R \zo^{n}}[Eve'(G''(s-1))] - E[Eve(U_{\ell(n)}]| \\
&= |\frac{1}{2}\E_{s \in_R \zo^{n}}[Eve(G''(s))] + \frac{1}{2}\E_{s' \in_R \zo^{n}}[Eve(G''(s'))] - \E[Eve[U_{\ell(n)}| \\
&= |\E_{s \in_R \zo^{n}}[Eve(G''(s))] -\E[Eve(U_{\ell(n)})]| > \epsilon(n)
\end{aligned}  
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={95}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[a75c5e30016538d6cbffc101b226399b]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={98}
\begin{aligned}
\Pr[\mathcal{A}(G'(s)) = 1] &= \Pr[\mathcal{A}(G'(s)) = 1 \mid A] \Pr[A] + \Pr[\mathcal{A}(G'(s)) = 1 \mid A^c] \Pr[A^c] \\
&=  \frac{1}{2}(1) + \frac{1}{2}((1- \frac{1}{2^{n-1}})\frac{1}{2} + \frac{1}{2^{n-1}}) \\
&= \frac{1}{2} + \frac{1}{4} - \frac{1}{2^{n+1}} + \frac{1}{2^n}\\
&= \frac{3}{4} + \frac{1}{2^n} - \frac{1}{2^{n+1}} \\
&= \frac{3}{4} + \frac{1}{2^{n+1}}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ad70146b431bea9ae74cf8385470c544]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={136}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[3e054ce6d7a05d640920b50bc8da5624]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={139}
\begin{aligned}
|\E[D^{f_k(\cdot)}(1^n)] - E[D^{f(\cdot)}(1^n)]| &= |\Pr[PRF_{\mathcal{A},F}(n) = 1] - \Pr[PRF_{\mathcal{A},F}(n) = 0]) \\
&> |\frac{1}{2} + p(n) - (\frac{1}{2} - p(n)) | \\
&= 2p(n)
\end{aligned}                                              
\]%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[04a25ef2aa49a0c3a0d4ffe94a2ad4af]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={154}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ea5f4c914c5aa7061038128810237766]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={154}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0b16b64eda21b3b8aa26251ee5e21ecb]%mdk
$2p(n)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={160}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ea5f4c914c5aa7061038128810237766]%mdk
$f \in Func_n$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={161}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f55fcd9745b34e40639d81c49eb07a8e]%mdk
$f_k$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={161}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e56bcce50c2b511fdb1a42199a17e643]%mdk
$p(n)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={161}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[df3471d15534c2b765a8ed24474a6a3b]%mdk
$\mathcal{A} = D$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={161}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[a9310c72f9c7765e78d8d164b6640358]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={164}
\begin{aligned}
\Pr[PRF_{\mathcal{D},F}(n) = 1] &= \Pr[PRF_{\mathcal{D},F}(n) = 1 \mid b = 0]\Pr[b = 0] + \Pr[PRF_{\mathcal{D},F}(n) = 1 \mid b = 1]\Pr[b = 1] \\
&= \frac{1}{2}\Pr[D^{f_k(\cdot)}(1^n) = 1] + \frac{1}{2}\Pr[D^{f(\cdot)}(1^n) = 0] \\
&= \frac{1}{2}\Pr[D^{f_k(\cdot)}(1^n) = 1] + \frac{1}{2} - \frac{1}{2}\Pr[D^{f(\cdot)}(1^n) = 1] \\
&=  \frac{1}{2} + \frac{1}{2}|\E[D^{f_k(\cdot)}(1^n)]| - \frac{1}{2}|\E[D^{f(\cdot)}(1^n)]| \\
&> \frac{1}{2} + \frac{1}{2}|\E[D^{f_k(\cdot)}(1^n)] - \E[D^{f(\cdot)}(1^n)]| \\
&= \frac{1}{2} + \frac{p(n)}{2}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b026eacdbcc450021b0eff7b3402c7a9]%mdk
$\mathcal{O}(0) = A0 = b, \mathcal{O}(e_1) = Ae+1 + b = A_1 + b, \mathcal{O}(e_2) = Ae_2 + b = A_2 + b$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={203}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[693a3b974c23e87e8c941211cd45cfb8]%mdk

$A$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={203}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[d3ba412b29a6b7a928b9f61f6c54628e]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={205}
\begin{aligned}
\mathcal{O}(e_1 + e_2) &= A(e_1 + e_2) + b \\
&= Ae_1 + A_2e_2 + b \\
&= A_1 + A_2 + b \\
&= A_1 + b + A_2 + b - b \\
&= \mathcal{O}(e_1) + \mathcal{O}(e_2) - b
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={297}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[ec9bd3bd2cc68d7f4e924d7d999105f4]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={300}
\begin{aligned}
\tau_1 \oplus \tau_2 \oplus \tau_3 &= S_k(m_1 || m_2 || r) \oplus S_k(m_2 || m_3 || r) \oplus S_k(m_1 || m_3 || r) \\
&= F_k(\langle 1 \rangle || m_1) \oplus F_k(\langle 2 \rangle || m_2) \oplus g(r)\\
& \oplus F_k(\langle 1 \rangle || m_2) \oplus F_k(\langle 2 \rangle || m_3) \oplus g(r) \\
&\oplus F_k(\langle 1 \rangle || m_1) \oplus F_k(\langle 2 \rangle || m_3) \oplus g(r) \\
&= g(r) \oplus g(r) \\
&\oplus F_k(\langle 1 \rangle || m_1) \oplus F_k(\langle 1 \rangle || m_1) \\
&\oplus F_k(\langle 2 \rangle || m_3) \oplus F_k(\langle 2 \rangle || m_3) \\
&\oplus F_k(\langle 1 \rangle || m_2) \oplus F_k(\langle 2 \rangle || m_2) \oplus g(r) \\
&= F_k(\langle 1 \rangle || m_2) \oplus F_k(\langle 2 \rangle || m_2) \oplus g(r)\\
&= S_k(m_2 || m_2 || r)
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

$\tau' = h(\tau, m_{t+1})$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={361}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ee95830ca24da10b2066241795177da4]%mdk
$(m || m_{t+1}, \tau')$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={363}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c4ca4238a0b923820dcc509a6f75849b]%mdk
$1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={363}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[f6248cfaae3057c0245afec5e3907240]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={367}
\begin{aligned}
MAC_{s,k}(m || m_{t+1}) &= H^s(k || m || m_{t+1}) \\
&= h(H^s(k || m) || m_{t+1}) \\
&= h(MAC_{s,k}(m) || m_{t+1}) \\
&= h(\tau, m_{t+1}) \\
&= \tau'
\end{aligned} 
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
